First Name PAN TIN No Service Tax Registration Number Central Excise Registration Number Provisional ID issued by GSTN Address of Principal Place of Business/Additional Place of Business from where supply of goods/services would be made to OTPL HSN Code SAC Code
OBEROI THERMIT PVT. LTD. AAACO1387P 05006349257-UTTARAKHAND FORM ST 2 :- AAACO1387PSD003 Exempted Notification No. 49/2003-CE Dated the 10th June'2003 or □ Notification No. 50/2003-CE Dated the 10th June,2003: 05AAACO1387P1Z3 - U.K. PLOT NO. 3, SECTOR - 8B, IIE, SIDCUL, HARIDWAR, UTTARAKH AND. 7302 9954

Please Note: At the time of finalization, kindly mention following points in your purchase order: 1) P.O.reference no. & date 2) Delivery date 3) GST Detail 4) Consignee name & address with pin code no. 5) Kindly mention name and contact nos. of your site manager (Concerned person at site), the boss of the site manager (To whom we can contact if there is any problem), Accounts Person (Who will handle the release of payments).

Thanking you.
Yours Truly,
For Oberoi Thermit Pvt. Ltd. Image
(Authorized Signatory)
